pli-tv-bu-vb-sk11:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk11:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū mahāhasitaṃ hasantā antaraghare gacchanti …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk11:8.2: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca mahāhasitaṃ hasanto antaraghare gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
